Articles.Content:
[![lniUO0wl.png](http://i.imgur.com/lniUO0wl.png)](http://imgur.com/lniUO0w)

Very small plugin - 5 flags for Poland. 

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/23fcmtkbvv2rhuh/PolishFlagsPack.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/23fcmtkbvv2rhuh/PolishFlagsPack.zip?dl=0)

When logo for POLSA will be selected, this pack will be updated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit:

Changed host from Kerbalstuff to Dropbox - apparently "adding content into game" is not a mod.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T14:59:53Z" title="04/28/2015 02:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Venthe**
  
Add info

Beautiful. Self plug time. Go check out my Lorefriendly flag pack if you haven't already. I've got a Poland parody flag. [UAL002's Lorefriendly Serious Parody Flags](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86957-0-25-UAL002-s-Lorefriendy-Serious-Parody-Flags-v1-5-Now-with-Roundels%21?highlight=flag+pack) Contribute something too.
